attributes.action: sell off politicians' second homes to raise funds before selling off 'assets' such as the Royal Mint
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has no right to sell off National Institutions to raise funds having helped cause and worsen the debt this country is now in.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
